20110112233338.000|20110112233341.000|CC1|>> THIS IS THE SAME KIND OF     
20110112233341.000|20110112233343.000|CC1|HANDGUN, A GLOCK 19 WITH AN     
20110112233343.000|20110112233345.000|CC1|EXTENDED MAGAZINE USED IN THE   
20110112233345.000|20110112233345.000|CC1|DEADLY SHOOTING.                
20110112233345.000|20110112233347.000|CC1|NOT ONLY DOES IT HOLD A LOT OF  
20110112233347.000|20110112233350.000|CC1|BULLETS BUT IT FIRES THEM VERY  
20110112233350.000|20110112233350.000|CC1|QUICKLY.

20110112233351.000|20110112233353.000|CC1|MY LIFE I'VE SHOT A HANDGUN AND 
20110112233353.000|20110112233356.000|CC1|THE THIRD TIME I'VE SHOT A      
20110112233356.000|20110112233356.000|CC1|GLOCK.                          
20110112233356.000|20110112233400.000|CC1|LOOK AT THE DEADLY ACCURACY OF  
20110112233400.000|20110112233401.000|CC1|THIS WEAPON.                    
20110112233401.000|20110112233404.000|CC1|THE GLOCK 19 PISTOL'S EXTENDED  
20110112233404.000|20110112233405.000|CC1|MAGAZINE IS ILLEGAL IN SIX      
20110112233405.000|20110112233408.000|CC1|STATES BUT NOT IN ARIZONA.

20110112233409.000|20110112233410.000|CC1|STOCKING UP BECAUSE THEY'RE     
20110112233410.000|20110112233413.000|CC1|CONCERNED IT WILL BE BANNED.

20110112233427.000|20110112233429.000|CC1|THEY DROVE OFF.                 
20110112233429.000|20110112233430.000|CC1|THEY EXPRESSED SYMPATHY FOR THE

20110112233431.000|20110112233433.000|CC1|THERE ARE NO WORDS THAT CAN

20110112233437.000|20110112233438.000|CC1|>> AS THE ON-LINE RAMBLINGS OF  
20110112233438.000|20110112233440.000|CC1|JARED LOUGHNER ARE BECOMING     
20110112233440.000|20110112233441.000|CC1|KNOWN IT APPEARS THE YOUNG MAN  
20110112233441.000|20110112233443.000|CC1|WAS SUFFERING A LONG, STEADY    
20110112233443.000|20110112233444.000|CC1|MENTAL BREAKDOWN, BUT IT'S NOT  
20110112233444.000|20110112233446.000|CC1|CLEAR WHETHER IT'S ENOUGH TO

20110112233453.000|20110112233455.000|CC1|THOSE WORDS TO DESCRIBE HIS

20110112233503.000|20110112233505.000|CC1|HAVE AGGRESSION 24/7?           
20110112233505.000|20110112233506.000|CC1|HE ALSO EXPRESSES HURT AT BEING 
20110112233506.000|20110112233508.000|CC1|REJECTED BY WOMEN, WRITING,     
20110112233508.000|20110112233509.000|CC1|IT'S FUNNY WHEN THEY SAY, LET'S 
20110112233509.000|20110112233511.000|CC1|GOOD ON A DATE ABOUT THREE      
20110112233511.000|20110112233513.000|CC1|TIMES, AND THEY DON'T GO.       
20110112233513.000|20110112233515.000|CC1|AND THERE ARE THESE VIOLENT     
20110112233515.000|20110112233516.000|CC1|IMAGES.                         
20110112233516.000|20110112233517.000|CC1|I KNOW HOW TO CUT A BODY OPEN   
20110112233517.000|20110112233519.000|CC1|AND EAT YOU FOR MORE THAN A

20110112233548.000|20110112233549.000|CC1|LOUGHNER IN HIGH SCHOOL.

20110112233717.000|20110112233723.000|CC1|DIVORCE IS TAKING A BITTER      
20110112233723.000|20110112233723.000|CC1|TURN.                           
20110112233723.000|20110112233724.000|CC1|HIS ESTRANGED WIFE CAMILLE
